reviews.review_msg: Dr. Attewell is incredibly kind and easy to approach. Her lectures are engaging, and you spend most of the time in a collaborative discussion. Also, she is willing to help with all your assignments and your final project. A professor who really cares about her students.

The topics explored in this class felt very niche; it was very fun to explore and reflect on new concepts I hadn't heard of before. Dr. Attewell is very nice and approachable and gave great advice and help regarding any concerns I had over assignments. Readings were interesting and very manageable. Final is a choice between creative project/ essay

Dr. Attewell is such an amazing professor. You can tell that she is passionate about every topic that she teaches and so respectful of everyone's opinions. Participation does not always have to be talking in class, she gives lots of opportunities for writing thoughts downs too
